document.full_text: british american tobacco plc has won its fight to be dropped from a u.s. justice department lawsuit in which cigarette companies were found to have conspired to lie about the dangers of tobacco.
document.title: british american tobacco dropped from u.s. case
lines_and_colors: british american tobacco plc has won its fight to be dropped from a u.s. justice department lawsuit in which cigarette companies were found to have conspired to lie about the dangers of tobacco.
